name: The Residence: VR
description:
Use your wits to find all 4 family heirlooms in this spooky residence and escape with your will still-intact.

Oculus Quest 2 Controls:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Rotate VR RIg

Grip Buttons - Grabbing/Holding Objects

Left Shoulder Grab - Backpack

Some assets were used from the following developers:

Archteria3D 

HurricaneVR
